languages.text: "Речь не столько о развлечении, Лорд-капитан, сколько о том, чтобы задать тон всему вашему правлению. Эти мероприятия дадут людям понять, каковы вы — как личность и как правитель{mf||ница}".

traits.locale_text: "Речь не столько о развлечении, Лорд-капитан, сколько о том, чтобы задать тон всему вашему правлению. Эти мероприятия дадут людям понять, каковы вы — как личность и как правитель{mf||ница}".

languages.text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."
languages.original_text: "Речь не столько о развлечении, Лорд-капитан, сколько о том, чтобы задать тон всему вашему правлению. Эти мероприятия дадут людям понять, каковы вы — как личность и как правитель{mf||ница}".

traits.locale_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

"It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

"It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

languages.text: 「娯楽性はさほど気にしなくて構いません、ロード・キャプテン。その治世全体をどのようなものにしたいかという風潮を示せればよいのです。こうした活動で人民はあなたの人間として、統治者としての陛下を知ることになるのです」
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: 「娯楽性はさほど気にしなくて構いません、ロード・キャプテン。その治世全体をどのようなものにしたいかという風潮を示せればよいのです。こうした活動で人民はあなたの人間として、統治者としての陛下を知ることになるのです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，这与其说是让他们开心，不如说是在为您的统治定下基调。这场活动将会让您的臣民看到您是什么样的人，以及您会是怎样的统治者。”
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这与其说是让他们开心，不如说是在为您的统治定下基调。这场活动将会让您的臣民看到您是什么样的人，以及您会是怎样的统治者。”

languages.text: «No es tanto el entretenimiento, Lord Capitán, como el tono que quiere establecer para su reinado al completo. Estas actividades informarán a la gente de quién es usted, como persona y como gobernante».
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: «No es tanto el entretenimiento, Lord Capitán, como el tono que quiere establecer para su reinado al completo. Estas actividades informarán a la gente de quién es usted, como persona y como gobernante».

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas tant un divertissement qu'un avant-goût de votre règne, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ces festivités permettront au peuple de savoir qui vous êtes ; en tant que personne, mais aussi en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. »
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas tant un divertissement qu'un avant-goût de votre règne, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ces festivités permettront au peuple de savoir qui vous êtes ; en tant que personne, mais aussi en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. »

languages.text: "Es geht dabei weniger um Unterhaltung, Lord Captain, sondern um den Ton, den Eure gesamte Herrschaft haben soll. Die Aktivitäten zeigen den Menschen, wer Ihr seid – als Person und als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin}."
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht dabei weniger um Unterhaltung, Lord Captain, sondern um den Ton, den Eure gesamte Herrschaft haben soll. Die Aktivitäten zeigen den Menschen, wer Ihr seid – als Person und als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin}."

languages.text: "Eğlence olarak algılamayın Lord Kaptan, hükümdarlığınızın edasını belirlemek gibi düşünün. Bu faaliyetler, insanların hem bir birey hem de hükümdar olarak nasıl biri olduğunuzu bilmesini sağlayacak."
languages.original_text: "It is not so much about the entertainment, Lord Captain, as it is about the tone you wish to set for your entire reign. These activities will let the people know who you are — as a person and as a ruler."

traits.locale_text: "Eğlence olarak algılamayın Lord Kaptan, hükümdarlığınızın edasını belirlemek gibi düşünün. Bu faaliyetler, insanların hem bir birey hem de hükümdar olarak nasıl biri olduğunuzu bilmesini sağlayacak."
